tools.name: Sunburst Topic Explorer
tools.description: Visualize and explore Solace topic hierarchies using interactive sunburst charts.

tools.name: Solace Try-Me Event Feeds
tools.description: Simulate publishing events using curated feeds to test your Solace integrations.

tools.name: AsyncAPI Studio w/ Event Portal Import
tools.description: Create and visualize AsyncAPI specs with native support for importing from Solace Event Portal.

tools.name: AsyncAPI Event Portal Importer
tools.description: A CLI tool to import AsyncAPI specifications into Solace Event Portal.

tools.name: AsyncAPI Event Portal Importer REST Service
tools.description: A RESTful service for importing AsyncAPI definitions into Solace Event Portal.

tools.name: Solace Try-Me CLI
tools.description: Command-line interface to simulate publishing and subscribing to Solace brokers.

tools.name: Pretty Dump
tools.description: Format Solace message payloads into human-readable structures for easier debugging.

tools.name: SDKPerf
tools.description: Performance testing utility for Solace APIs to benchmark throughput and latency.

tools.name: VSCode Try-Me Extension
tools.description: VSCode extension to interactively test Solace messaging via Try-Me client.

tools.name: IntelliJ Event Portal Plugin
tools.description: IntelliJ plugin to interact with the Solace Event Portal directly from your IDE.

tools.name: IntelliJ Try-Me Plugin
tools.description: Send and receive messages directly in IntelliJ using the Solace Try-Me interface.

tools.name: MuleSoft Anypoint / Eclipse IDE Plugin
tools.description: Use Solace Event Portal inside MuleSoft Anypoint Studio or Eclipse to generate models.

tools.name: Slack Plugin
tools.description: Access your Event Portal resources directly from Slack. Including Application Domains, Applications, Events and Schemas

tools.name: Confluence Plugin
tools.description: Embed Solace Event Portal assets and references directly into Confluence documentation.

tools.name: SAP CI CodeGen from Event Portal
tools.description: Generates SAP Cloud Integration (CPI) iFlow artifacts from AsyncAPI specifications exported from Solace Event Portal, streamlining event-driven integration development.

tools.name: Logstash Input for Solace
tools.description: A Logstash plugin that allows ingesting events from Solace PubSub+ into the Elastic Stack for observability and analysis.

tools.name: Logstash Output for Solace
tools.description: A Logstash plugin that enables publishing events from Logstash pipelines to Solace PubSub+ event brokers, facilitating seamless integration between the Elastic Stack and Solace messaging infrastructure.

tools.name: Wireshark SMF Plugin
tools.description: A Wireshark plugin for decoding Solace SMF (Solace Message Format) packets, enabling low-level inspection and troubleshooting of Solace network traffic.

tools.name: Solace Quarkus Extension
tools.description: An extension that integrates Solace messaging into the Quarkus framework for reactive Java microservices.

tools.name: Log4j Solace Appender
tools.description: A Log4j appender that publishes logs as Solace messages, enabling event-driven observability and distributed logging patterns.

tools.name: Steampipe Plugin for Solace
tools.description: A Steampipe plugin to query Solace Event Portal assets using SQL, enabling powerful insights and reporting with simple queries.

tools.name: Solace Queue Browser Extension
tools.description: A browser extension to view the payload and metadata of messages in a Solace Event Broker queue.

tools.name: Solace Prometheus Exporter
tools.description: A Prometheus exporter for Solace Message Brokers, enabling monitoring and observability.

tools.name: Spring Cloud Stream Request-Reply
tools.description: A Spring Boot starter providing request-reply functionality for Spring Cloud Stream applications using Solace.

tools.name: Solace Queue Browser
tools.description: A utility to browse messages in Solace queues, supporting both desktop and in-browser modes.

tools.name: Angular Solace Message Client
tools.description: An Angular client for sending and receiving messages using the Solace SMF protocol over WebSocket.

tools.name: Spring Solace Leader Election
tools.description: A Spring Boot implementation of leader election using Solace exclusive queues.

tools.name: Spring Boot Starter Solace Client Config
tools.description: A Spring Boot starter for configuring Solace clients with externalized configuration.

tools.name: GraphQL Solace Subscriptions
tools.description: A GraphQL subscription implementation using Solace messaging for real-time data updates.

tools.name: Solace JMSToolBox
tools.description: A GUI tool for browsing and managing JMS queues and topics on Solace Event Brokers.

tools.name: Conapi Message Manager
tools.description: A web-based tool for managing and monitoring messages in Solace Event Brokers.

tools.name: Solace Broker Terraform Provider
tools.description: A Terraform provider for managing Solace Event Broker configurations.

tools.name: Solace Broker Appliance Terraform Provider
tools.description: A Terraform provider for managing Solace Event Broker Appliance configurations.

phases.name: Github Action Solace Event Portal Configuration Push
phases.description: A github action that facilitates the Solace Event Portal Config push through CI/CD interactions

phases.name: Github Action Solace Event Broker Provisioning
phases.description: A github action that facilitates the provisioning of a Solace Event Broker through reflecting a desing from Solace Event Portal
